content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from my friends on 5th nov,when a bright orange light in the sky got my attention.At first it was just hovering there,then it moved silently towards me slightly to my left passed and went by before dissapearing into thin air.I had to pull over and exit my vehicle to get a look at this thing as i knew straight away it was different to anything i had ever seen before.I had on me a digital camera ,but in my excitement could not activate the video,instead i just took one single photo of a minute orange dot in the distance.Although its a bad photo you can clearly see how orange the object was.Im into the ufo scene and always looking,but also making sure there are no strobe lights are anything of that nature,making sure its not a plane or helicopter.But heres the deal.Gets home to tell my partner and she seen it also.The very next night ,the 6th it was back.My partner and my 5 year old daughter were watching it hovering over the town from our bedroom window.We all watched it for a couple of minutes,then i ran for my camera,but as soon as i got it ,my partner said it had just blinked out and dissapeared into thin air.Just now on the 8th,i was driving to the shops and there it is again.I pulled over and watched it hovering over the vacinity of bolton a town nearby to ours.It hovered for a couple of minutes,then sort of circled upwards,going round and round in very tight circles,before it sort of shrank in size and completely dissapeared.I came home checked the web to see if our local paper has been covering any sightings.When all i could find was a few storys of orange lights over lancashire england,i had to tell someone and here i am telling you.I am absolutly posotive that what i saw was no conventional craft,and as far as im concerned have elimanated such objects as chinese lanterns and fireworks etc.The way in wich this thing hovered then moved silently and quickly,then dissapearing into thin air,has astounded me.I have never reported anything in my life before ,but thought it was to good a sighting to dismiss without sharing it with someone such as you at mufon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Like a triangle shaped bright orange light

content.detailedDescription: Moving light in sw part of sky. an be watched at this link: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=j9_v3dju03o
content.summary: Object filmed in sky

content.detailedDescription: This is the second nights i have seen these strange lights in the sky.  today, more, they seem to travel quite fast, 4 in a line, with the same distance between each one, then the 5th further back.  they seem to disappear into nowhere.  around 10 minutes after this sighting in a different direction, i saw firstly a row of three lights, one big white one, a smaller light in the centre, then another big white one at the end, which i would say were all from one flying object.  minutes later, i saw another one of these red lights, very low, very clear, no sound, it looked like a giant candle flame burning red.
content.summary: 6 red lights in sky, one close looked like a giant candle flame

content.detailedDescription: Me my wife and daughter were driving home from sons football game we were traveling north on rt. 222 near the akron exit. my wife saw first and said what is that in sky its going way to fast for plane and is very bright,as i was looking it seemed to stop like it knew we were looking at it,then tookoff  and was out of sight in seconds the sun was setting behind us and it went ahead and to the right of us,within a min or two there were two trails in the sky from the direction of the sun,my daughter was able to get a picture of one of the trails,
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Very shiney like chrome too bright and reflective to make out

content.detailedDescription: I was in the midst of the afternoon commute on the diagonal highway which connects boulder, co with longmont, co.  i was driving northbound around 5:00 pm--still broad daylight--when i noticed an oddly symmetrical dark rectangle hanging in fairly heavy haze about a mile east (right) of the highway. it was hovering at approximately 30��� above the horizon (90��� being straight overhead) it had the same aspect ratio and rectangular, rounded-cornered shape as the spacebar on the typical computer keyboard. there were no clouds in the sky at all, looking in that direction.  i kept stealing glances at the object as the traffic flowed along, to see if the shape would change or the object showed any signs of movement.  as i drove further, a stand of trees was coming up on the right, which i knew would obstruct my view of the object when they went by, i prepared myself to take up the observation again when the trees were passed.  when i cleared the trees the sky was completely empty.  i kept glancing to the right for several minutes but the object had completely disappeared.
content.summary: Shaped like the spacebar on a computer keyboard.  dark gray to black in color. hovering far enough away to be obscured by the haze.

content.detailedDescription: I was hog hunting in wilson ok. a strange burst of wind hit me. this wind was blowing in a circle,and making a strange humming sound. much like a high powered electric motor. i would have thought it was a natural occurance had it not been for the humming. this wind was blowing at 30-40 mph in a circular pattern. i know this because i could see the tops of the trees bending in a circular pattern. this noise stayed over my head for about two minutes,before moving away. i watched the tree's blow in a circular pattern for about one hundred yards as it moved away. my feelings and reaction were of terror. i was armed with a rifle and a handgun and was terrified. somthing flew over my head i could not see. i'm certain of it.
content.summary: Somthing invisible flew overhead.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were driving along interstate 82 south of yakima, near sunnyside, wa when my fiance pointed out a triangular formation of stars. she made a remark about them, to which i in turned remarked that there were many, many stars that could be pointed out into a triangle. the stars were in front of our view, so i watched them without much thought. i then noticed the stars were not in a triangle any longer, but the middle star which made up the left point of the triangle was now in the center of the other two stars, making a straight line. as we continued on our drive, we began to realize that the object was not a star at all. it's coloration was akin to that of mars, however we drove closer to it rather than it staying in the backdrop. the object did not flash in any sequence (as airplanes are required to do) and it was too high to be the top of a cellular tower. the object did not seem to move in any direction, after it's initial movement, but remained stationary in the sky as we past to the west of it.
content.summary: Red light seen in sky, clearly not a star.

content.detailedDescription: We were indpendece and just came out of the store and debbie said what that i looked up and we saw 5 orbs 3 of them were in a strait line like the lights over arzonia the other two just set there and one of them made a pefect s monver and circled one the lights and went back i was so in amzed that i was having trouble with my phone i was going to take a pick of the lights and then they just blinked out i am a former ctt and am very fimalar with aircraft and had a ts sci clearnce and have never seen any aircraft (man made) make these manovers they were not airplans they had no red or blinking lights on them they were constant like a flar i have always been a bliver in life out there and i'm so stoked that i got to see this event and this is where the wierd part begans  our gps system was off and in the consule with the battery dead and it began to give us directions and the toys we got for son began to make nosie without being turned on and the radio went silent the only thing that didnt happen was truck didnt die this is the wriedist experice i have ever had and debbie saw it all i just wander has any one in the northern ky area seen this at about 8pm
content.summary: Five orbes

content.detailedDescription: I saw a silver disk in the air low on the horizon.  i ran to get my camera and when i was able to take the pictures it was higher in the sky.  when i first saw it i was immediatly interested in it as it was very unusual.  it moved in an erratic pattern back and forth in th sky and lasted about 10 min total.  since i work in the aviation industry i am aware of the normal ways that aircraft behave and this did not behave in that way.  photos were facing an easterly direction,
content.summary: I saw in the sky a very unusual object

content.detailedDescription:
From 45224, north boundary of city of cincinnati,ohio, usa, in the southern sky shortly before 8pm.
there was one large soft-white spherical glow appeared in the sky and slowly dropped in altitude. it split and became 4 distinct lights. these lights were surprisingly bright and large for the dusk sky. there were airplane headlights in the sky at various locations that were very small, distant, and dim in comparison. 
the four lights formed a diamond pattern and held static in the air, about approx 3000 feet altitude. i thought for sure people on interstate 75 at about mitchell exit (exit 6) southbound would see it. i approximate that the lights were above spring grove cemetery. i was on the phone with my husband, who also saw exactly the same thing from a different vantage point from the car. 
after they held the diamond pattern, they moved with a swiftness and a very short "tail" like a comet, but it was blurry, like blurry lights. they changed formation and seemed to "swirl" down slowly blinking on and off until they were all off. i could not tell if they were dark, gone, or below the horizon.
i have never seen anything like this before. my husband and i agree- this was definitely not a plane or a blimp. we were sure it was alien. absolutely sure. it was beautiful and fascinating, but we were both terrified, too. he saw a red light orb ufo when he was young, but i have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: 4 bright white lights changing formation

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor and i were outside with a campfire in her backyard. she was telling me they were getting new eaves on the house. we were looking up at it when three dull orange lights in a v shape went over the house, south to north. the lights did not remain consistently apart, but the central light moved first west, closer to the one, then east closer to the other. all were simultaneously moving. as they went maybe 1/4 mile, they came closer together, all three, and then disappeared.  no sound. the fact they were dull or blurry looking didn't occur to me until later.  it was a crystal clear night and all the stars were very clear and sharp. this was not a plane and the moving of the location of the light was not due to perspective. i have a master's degree in fine art and know what perspective does to things in location as they move.
content.summary: Three dull orange lights in a v shape

content.detailedDescription: I came outside to my car and as a friend got into the car they noticed a bright orange glowing light through the trees coming towards us traveling from west to east. the object appeared to be moving at a constant speed and also in a straight line just north of where i was standing. i thought it could have been an airplane or an helicopter considering we live north of the detroit metro airport. but the object kept moving in the sky and did not take any direction toward the airport at all. as i looked closer, there was not one blinking light that airplanes would have. for how far the object was, it looked to be moving faster than a airplane. i could see other airplanes in the sky that were traveling about half the speed, and this seemed to be at an higher altitude. which made me wonder..How could an aircraft at an higher altitude travel faster than a aircraft at a lower altitude? i knew to myself this couldnt be an aircraft, unless it was on fire because there was a certain radial glow to it. as it passed my friend and i, the object seemed to disappear into the sky within a couple of seconds. the sighting last for about 20 seconds
content.summary: Orange glowing sphere traveling across sky from west to east

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, delivery driver for a local pizzaria, and driving south on sr. 22/3 when i saw a single light appear almost directly ahead of me. i just happened to be looking at the right place at the right time. recently  i had seen some aerial flares and thought it might be another set, but these lights stayed and didn't fade away. first there was a single light, and then a second in the 1:30 position of the first, followed by a third in the 4:30 position creating a perfect triangle. then a fourth popped up in the 1:30 position from the third, making a rhombus, and then a fifth from the 4:30 position of the fourth. i drove about a mile looking at these in the sky and it seemed they were moving away. i watched them until a traffic light made them very hard to see as they were getting lower and dimmer. total duration was around 2-3 mins. overall it was steady and held it's shape. there was around a 1 second delay before the second appeared. this interval was held constant for all additional lights.
content.summary: Lights slowly appearing one after another.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading out the door to work and noticed a light pattern moving slowly over my neighbors house away from mine.  it was only a few thousand feet up, what i would consider lower or equal to a helicopter height.  this wasn't the normal "lights in the sky".  this was a full disc shaped craft with lights moving around it counter clockwise.  it was moving away and i could see the lights as they circled around, disappeared as it went in front of my line of sight and came back around.  by far the most amazing thing i've ever seen.  it moved slowly over my neighborhood and went just out of my sight.  i ran down the road a bit to continue to watch it and when i got there, it was gone.  totally gone.  as i looked around, just above me a typical "ball of light" materialized out of nowhere and zipped off towards the craft i had just watched.  this entire event was about 10 minutes.  this first craft i saw was so clear and moving so slow that if i would have had a video camera, it would have been the best ufo footage i've ever seen.  bummer
content.summary: Disc slowly over my neighborhood followed by another

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on the phone at or around 7:15pm november 6th 2009, and looked at the sky as i normally would. i live close to alliance airport and like to see the planes land from my back yard. i watched as what seem to appear to be an airplane coming in from an other than normal flight pattern. the planes that come in to alliance airport will fly in from the north, northwest and make its landing. what i saw were eight lights coming from the south. there seem to be more lights on this plane, and the lights appeared bigger than a normal plane that would land at this airport. i waited to hear the sound of the plane landing and i didn���t hear anything. i thought it was strange to see so many lights on a plane and to look so perfectly still, i could never really make out a silhouette of a plane because the light were bright, i never saw the plane land, and never heard the plane land, which i always hear, because i am less than a mile away from the airport, before i could make any sense of it, the lights had disappeared.
content.summary: Perfectly aligned lights in a disk like form that moved slow and had no noise

content.detailedDescription:
Well, after viewing a strange huge red craft dip low into the park from my window, i ran out to central park to capture it on film. by the time i arrive at the great hill in central park, 3 huge blackchoppers begin to surround me and either monitor me or the red craft that resembles orbs attached together to form some sort of airplane. it was very scary. i was very frightened. they just stood over the hill and over my head for a while. the red craft re-appears and you see the blackchoppers start to react to it.. one chopper flew directly under the red craft. the craft was above the choppers and i and the 2 witnesses i bumped into saw it all. after a while, the choppers leave and the red craft begins to fly lower and lower. it also begins to fly directly over me as well.  this happened on wednesday night. the choppers came back a few hours later and began to fly over the park once again. what the crafts looks like is multiple orbs, green, white, red all huddled and attached to each other to form a plane. the "craft" seems to at times change shape or patterns in mid air. at times it looks like helicopter, then an airplane and even an airplane flying backwards...  somes times just 2 lights are flashing, other times 4-6...   no noise , just a loud humming sound.. very strange.. this is over central park in nyc, and nothing is suppose to be flying that low due to new 9/11 flight regulations.  my footage is from on top of the great hill, located on 104th & 105th and central park. the highest point in central park..  those black choppers are here for a reason..  i think either the military is up to something or the choppers are the ufos them selfs who mimic our planes and helicopters.. (vik456@youtube)

vik456 nyc
content.summary: Choppers surround me and ufo in central park.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching television at about 7:15pm and had the back door open so that my dogs could run in and out.  my pomeranian began barking and wouldn't stop. i yelled to her to be quiet as i thought she was barking at the dog next door.  she continued to bark and ran inside and began frantically barking at me. it was then that i noticed she was looking out the window at the sky behind me.  i ran outside and when i looked up i saw a large flaming meteor about the size of a full moon.  it was black in the center with white flames around it and red on the edge of the tail.  it was so large and moving so quickly i froze and the only thing i could think of is if this thing crashes we are going to die.  before i could gain my composure and decide what to do it changed right before my eyes.  it suddenly stopped and became a smaller flamed object and turned into one, then two, then three huge balls of extremely white light.  it was as if they had been stacked one behind the other. one to the right then one to the left while the last remained in the center.  they were very bright and each about the size of a full moon.  they were perfectly spaced apart in a straight line.  it took a minute for my thoughts to catch up as a second before i was deciding how to survive a crashing meteor and now that was gone and i had accept a new impossible situation in a very short amount of time.  i remember saying out loud, "what is happening?" and that is when i noticed some neighbors talking in hushed voices and i believe that they were seeing it too.  
after hovering in a line for a few seconds they began to flash on and off.  when they would turn back on they would be in a different location in the sky. they seemed to take turns flashing on and off. they went from a straight line to a triangle and then a diagonal line.  they seemed to go through several patterns but i don't recall all of them. they also were higher and lower in the sky at different times.  
they finally ended up in an upside down triangle. the top two would flash in and out. and finally did not come back.  the last one remained and this was the only time that i saw actually movement instead of flashing in and out and ending up in a different location.  it floated slowing towards the ground and i really thought it was going to land.  it hovered very low for a few seconds and then if finally flashed out.
i stood in the silence and could not believe how quiet it was. there were the normal planes approaching and waiting to land at dfw airport.  i could not believe i did not see any military aircraft or some type of activity to signify that something amazing just happened. i finally  saw a large plane that seemed very close to the ground but i could not tell if it was military in the dark.  i waited a little while longer and a single helicopter flew around the neighborhood briefly and then it was gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fiery meteor splits into three ufos in keller, texas

content.detailedDescription: We walked out of konami where we had dinner and in the sky next to the bright star (or planet) we see every night was another bright light that looked the same brightness and size (but you could tell it was lower). then it started moveing to the left of the star (or planet) very slow with no indicater lights or strobes , you could tell it was differant since there were planes flying in the distance in three parts of the sky in differant dir and you could see there marker lights clearly. the light was going much slowerand almost overhead there were no clouds and you could see stars,as the light got as far as if you held up a yardstick at arms length away it began to fade ,then turn solid red and then blinking out altogether.I know it wasn't out of my line of sight because i was on a hill that overlooked a valley and could see for at least two miles all  around but behind me.I live in the path of the airport so i see,film and take pictures of planes and odd things in the sky often, and this acted like no plane or satellite.It makes me happy to know we may not be alone.
content.summary: Bright light fading to red then blinking out.

content.detailedDescription: Three friends doing an atv ride in the mountains of cordoba, argentina, where most specialists agree there's a big ufo activity. we didn't see the object but it showed in our picture. no other picture has any mistake or problem. the camera is a sony perfect functioning and never had a pic with any kind of  light trouble. what do you think?
content.summary: Look at it in the picture.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my office last night at 6:30 pm.  it was dark outside and for some reason i was admiring the stars in the clear night sky.  i was looking in one patch of sky to the wsw where there was nothing visible(don't know why i was looking at that spot) and suddenly a very bright object appeared at approximately 75 degrees. it was twice as bright as venus and five times as large. it looked like something had just been sitting there, then flashed its lights on and off just to let me know that they were there.  after that i drove home and later on - around 8:30 pm another object appeared in the same manner in the north sky at about 75 degrees.  this time, it moved north very quickly and out of sight, leaving a trail of light behind it.  that sighting lasted approximately four seconds.  

note: see the cms database for another sighting that was reported by three other witnesses at approximately the same time as this one. it may be the same object.

 i am the assistant state director - you don't need to assign this to anyone.
content.summary: Very bright ufo appeared, then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
My girl and i were having some people over for dinner last night.  our company (a couple and their son) arrived about 6.45p.  i had already put some potatoes on the grill to cook, and at about 7p i went outside to flip them.  the husband of the couple (call him 's') followed me out there, because we were already in the middle of a conversation about the real estate market.  at exactly 7.04 i felt the need to look at the sky.  

first thing i noticed was a really bright, white light..And when i say bright, i mean way brighter than anything else in the sky. the object looked almost stationary.  then i noticed it moving. i couldn't figure out what it was...The only thing i could think of is the iss.

it was at this point that i yelled at 's' to get out and look at it.  he was now on his phone, but he came out from under the covered patio...He was as awe-struck as i was. at this point, he noticed a jet in the sky.  then we both noticed that this bright object and the jet were going to perfectly intersect in the sky. 

the object started moving faster, and by our estimation traveling about twice as fast as the jet.  i almost thought it was a rocket or something at this point, because of the timing of the event.  now both of us are really in awe!

after they crossed paths, the object seemed to increase speed even more.  it made a gentle sweeping northerly turn...Followed by a gentle sweeping easterly turn...Followed by a another gentle sweeping northerly turn...And then again, followed by a gentle sweeping easterly turn.  then it just faded away. i'm not sure if this was because it was going into the earths shadow...But i can say this, unless we have satellites that turn, this was not a satellite. i also know it was not a shooting star, and it wasn't another plane. 

now, i'm shooting myself for not having my camera on hand.  so, i had to draw a picture of what i saw.  

also, this may have something to do with it...We have a international air show in town this week.  so, who knows...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Solid, super bright light intersecting with jet, then making turns and then disappearing in jax fl

content.detailedDescription: On 8-18-9009 while in an upper room in my home i observed a single red pulsing light move in a slow and constant speed and altitude,make three directional changes at 90 degree angles from an apparently silent platform.This object was first noticed at aprox. 1000-2000 ft north of my home at an estimated altitude of 1000-1500 ft. the object traveled northwest aprox. 3 miles turned left 90 degrees and proceeded south for aprox. 3/4 of a mile then reversed coures and proceeded north aprox. 3/4 of a mile befor making a final 90 degree torn, again left, to return it to it's origional heading-north by northwest. the object  continued on this course (traveling northwest) until it was no longer visible to me. i observed this objevt with a pair of bushnell 12x50 powre binoculars for nearly the entire duration of the event as they were in the same room i grabbed them very quickly. no f.A.A. lighting configurations were in use on this object. i would estimate the moving speed of this object at aprox. 35-40 m.P.H.
content.summary: Single red pulsing light  manovering slowly over south bismarck,n.D.

content.detailedDescription: It looked really close to where i lived.  i was driving home on pelandale rd in modesto towards riverbank and witnessed something bright just show up and dropped from the sky slow down and do a u turn and then fell again. it kept going to where it looked like it was going to hit the ground and it changed color to purple as it got closer to the ground. wondering where it may have gone i happened to look to the left of me in a auto center parking lot, less than a football field away, saw a strange light in line with the street lights a red round light with 3 or more blue lights that were smaller than the single red light the combo of the lights of the red and blue made like a purple.It was not large infact it fit right in with the street lights from a distance and was dead still. i could not grasp what i was looking at.I was still driving while i was trying to figure out what that combo of lights was. at the intersection of pelandale and mc henery i made a left turn hoping to get a glimpse of the "thing" from a different angle and by that time, it was in the air hoovering around quietly and almost balloon like but not going up in to the sky like a balloon but more like a deflated balloon. i pulled off and parked on the side of mc henery and tried to get a cell phone photo of it but it would not show up on my screen.  the photo was black. it was not a large object. i left and it was still just hoovering in the air.  i have a really hard time grasping what i just saw and even wierder is that from the looks of the bright object falling from the sky and then seeing the small red and multi blue lighted object i have a really hard time coralating that that would be the same object but the color of the "thing" was similar purple hue. nobobody saw it but me that i could tell. it was at around 8:17-8:25 pm. cars just kept going around me and it was very subtle and the lights were confusing.
content.summary: I saw something drop from the sky star like and then right u turn and drop again

content.detailedDescription: I was on interstate 70 traveling east by lakeside amusement park. i was riding in the backseat of a taxi and noticed something hovering to the south of the interstate. i watched it thinking it had to be a helicopter because it wasnt moving like airplanes do. i also notised the sun reflecting off of the bottom of it and it was a shiny silver. it didnt last long but then it just shot right up into the sky and i watched it vanish. it wasnt like anything i've ever seen before. it all happened so fast but i'm sure it wasnt an airplane or helicopter.
content.summary: Silver object hovered in the sky and shot straight up fast and was gone

content.detailedDescription: As my cousin and i were leaving tampa, driving on i-75... i didn't know which exit we neede to take so i asked my cousin which exit to take before he went to sleep. much of i-75, once you're out of the city is dark and not many lights... he told point down the highway telling me the exit is near those light poles a couple miles away... as i got closer to the lights i started to see that they were not light poles and as we got closer that they were not stationary... as i got within a quater mile of the lights i woke up my cousin and told him that those were'nt light poles, that they were helicopters... and as we got closer we both looked and could see that they weren't helicopters either... we got within about 150yds we could clearly see that the objects were about 200ft from the ground and that 1 object was hovering in the middle of the highway, a second was on our side of the highway hovering and another across the highway hovering maybe 50ft higher than the others... i slowed down from 75mph to 25mph with my head out of the window while we started to freak, saying "i know this is not what i'm thinking, ain't no damn way"... as we got up close to the objects one of them started crossing the highway directly above the truck...I was looking up from over the sterring wheel at thousands of lights beneath a disc shaped object just gliding across, making no sound at all... we could see that there was a fourth object in the field off the highway hovering, and looked to be spinning.. but, the others were'nt spinning, just hovering.. then we could see a fifth object coming from ahead of us on the opposite side of the highway, moving in the driection of the oncoming traffic... i told my cousin to look out the window as the object passed over us, and he stuck his head out the window to see, and i could hear him saying "oh [cms/tg/pd].. it's a disc, it's a real disc.. we could see the entire bottom of the disc changing colors like thousands of different color lights constantly changing.. the other 4 disc seemed to only have lights on the sides. we had nothing to take a picture with as my boost phone had no camera on it.  but, i can swear on my father's grave that what we seen was real and that they were discs.. and other people on the highway seen the same thing as they also, slowed nearly to stopping.. i don't know if the radio turned off during this encounter as i don't remeber turning it down.. but we sat quietly for the rest of the ride amazed and confused. i only wish i had a camero phone then. as we drove away i could see all the objects eventually going into the field on our side of the road and i watched in the rear-view mirror until they were out of sight. i don't know if it was from the adrenaline, but we both felt extremely energized for the remainder of the night.  i never felt threatened or scared, and wanted to stop and get out.. but my cousin would'nt let me and swore to leave me there if i stoped the truck. it was a freaky, but great  experience, i felt really happy for some reason.
content.summary: 5 disc crossing and hovering i-75

content.detailedDescription: I arrived home (in roanoke, which is a suburb of fort worth, tx) about 7:15pm cst and was bringing in dinner, when my 7 year old daughter noticed "yellow shooting stars" in the sky. i looked towards the southwest and saw three yellowish, extremely bright lights, in an upside-down triangular shape. all three of these lights were definitely separate entities, but were in perfect formation with each other, almost moving as one. when i first saw them, they were heading straight down with a tail behind them - kind of reminded me of what a comet would look like. all three of them made this streak behind them, then slowed down and the streak stopped. the light then faded slowly out to a pinprick and then all the sudden, they brightened back up again and went back higher in the sky and repeated the process over again. they fell slowly from the sky and had a trail behind them. the trail again phased out and then the light dimmed again to a pinprick. i ran inside the house and got my husband to come out and see it also. he watched the trio of lights do the same thing i saw two more times and then it disappeared from sight and didn't reappear. unfortunately, the lights vanished before we could get video on it. during and after, there was a huge plane of some kind that was circuling the airspace. when it turned, it was almost at a perfect 90 degree angle, which for a plane this big, it was amazing to watch. we didn't get a close look at the plane as it was winter months here and it was already dark, but we definitely saw it's massive size and the lights that were on it. it was also apparent that the triangluar-type lights were not part of this plane shape. rather, it looked like the plane was circling the area, almost like it was looking out for these lights, or whatever was making them. i checked online and wasn't able to find any reports of special events in the area that would give a legitimate excuse for the lights. if anyone knows what these lights were, please let me know!!
content.summary: Triple lights in a triangle shape over fort worth near roanoke

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving from tucson, arizona to indio, california for a weekend event. it was thursday, december 11, 2008. that night was the night of a full moon.
after driving west through blythe, california on interstate 10, my wife and i started seeing bright orbs in the sky. the orbs were not to far in the sky and would come on one below the other, like a traffic light sequence.
this continued on the north side of the freeway and a couple of times on the south, so we were observing the sky very intently trying to figure out what these were.
as i looked toward the south, a string of bright white lights appeared. my wife and i booth saw them, but in the bright moon light, i could make out the dark shape of a disk. the lights were on the edge and rotating in a clockwise direction. the lights came on and went off in the time it takes to say, now you see me, now you don't. it looked as if it was lighting up an area to land.
the craft was approximately 500 feet in the sky, at a 30 degree angle from the ground, appeared and disappeared. it was between 9:00 and 9:30pm, pt.
it was a life changing event to realize that something like that exists.
the hair on my arms stood up and my eyes watered. we continued to look as we continued on but nothing else appeared.

i look around every time we travel through that area. the area is northwest of the yuma proving grounds, so it may be a craft being tested from the base in yuma.....Or maybe not.
content.summary: Disk shaped with clockwise rotating bright white lights

content.detailedDescription:
First sighting: weather was warm and clear with a few thin high level clouds.

i was sitting on my deck in the back yard of our home this evening with my 6 year old daughter, rebekah.  i had finished mowing our yard and was enjoying the unusually warm evening (71 degrees).  the sun had already set and it was getting dark.  i would estimate the time to be approximately 6:00 pm.  as i was looking up into the sky and noticed what i thought was a bright star.  i told my daughter ���look, there���s the first star tonight���.  i told her this as she likes to make a wish on the first star of the evening.  however, as i was looking at the ���star���, i noticed something odd; it began to move in an ���s��� shaped flight path within a very short distance ��� less than one mile (estimated).  its movement was to the north and the speed of it was much faster than a standard airplane.  it quickly faded out of sight.  i waited a few minutes to see if it would reappear, but it did not.  i then informed my daughter to go get her mother (my wife) who was inside the house at the time of the sighting.

this first ufo sighting lasted for less than 15 seconds.  i would describe it as a bright, star-like object at high altitude.  it was not an aircraft as it did not display navigation or strobe lights.  i am well versed with commercial and military aircraft as i had spent 8 years in the u.S. air force and previously held a private pilot���s license.  this was not an ordinary aircraft, nor did it have a trail as would a falling star.  its luminescence was consistent until it faded from sight.  

regarding my feeling/emotions following the first sighting, i felt confused as i had not seen anything like this before, i.E., unidentified flying object.  i attempted to sort out all possibilities of what it was, such as a commercial/military aircraft, satellite, falling star, or some other natural phenomena.  i could not explain it.

second sighting:  at approximately 6:05 pm, my wife, fiona, had come outside with my daughter.  i calmly told her of the incident.  fiona did not know what to make of my sighting, but chose to stay outside with me.  at or about 6:15 pm, the bright, star-like light again appeared out of nowhere.  it appeared in the sky directly above our home and was much brighter this time, possibly due to the fact that it was at a lower altitude.  i pointed it out to my wife and she also witnessed it.  

this second ufo sighting lasted for about 30 seconds.  i would describe the object as a very bright white light, much brighter than the first sighting and seemed to slightly pulsate.  the object appeared to be descending, but then it quickly ascended and began to move in an arced flight path.  the light was moving at a very fast speed as it moved to the nne, traveling for approximately 2 miles.  the light faded as it ascended into the sky and it disappeared from sight.  we all waited to see if it would return again, but after several minutes, we decided to go inside.  this was the last time that i saw the object. 

regarding my feeling/emotions following the second sighting, i felt very bewildered.  i conferred with my wife attempting to sort out all possibilities of what it was.  neither of us could determine what it could possibly be.  it should be noted that we did notice commercial aircraft far to the north or our home as they were heading into kansas city international airport (mci).  however, these were traveling low along the northern horizon from east to west.
content.summary: Two ufo sightings within 15 minutes of each other.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my grandparents field looking for deer and i thought that i should head home. as i was walking home i noticed a little ball of colorful light and looked at the object through my binoculars. that was when i saw a circle object that had colors changing going all over it. as i watched it the object moved in a triangle pattern counter clockwise. i also noticed that the object had smaller white circles on the inside edge of the circle object. i walked a little forward toward it and it was gone.
content.summary: A circle that was very colorful and bright moving in a triangle pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the freeway and the cleveland airport was to my right.  i always look at the sky above the airport to see the planes landing and taking off.  i noticed something very out of place in the sky to the left of the airport/runways.  it was hazy black and pulsing.  or it seemed like it was pulsing.  it was zig zagging and moving up and down.  when it moved it was going so fast it gave the appearance of a trail behind it that was lighter in color then the object and transparent.  it's movements were very smooth and made it look alive.  i pulled onto the side of the freeway and grabbed my phone to take a picture.  as soon as i put my hand on the phone the object seemed to disappear.  i was shaking because i knew that what i saw was a ufo.  i took two photos of the same area that i saw the ufo floating in and included some landmarks to show my position.  the sky was clear and sunny.  there was no contrails or clouds when i snapped the shot.  i have two photos of a strange vapor trail that shoots right over the runways of the airport and it makes a sharp turn.  i did not see this with the naked eye or i would of taken many more pictures.  it shows that something was there and it moved very very fast.  if you use the paintbrush program on your computer and click on the "airbrush" then make the pen larger and drag it over the page that is the best way i can explain what i saw.
content.summary: A black hazy object shooting up, down, right, & left. moving so fast leaving a trail behind it giving the appearance of a snake.It seemed alive.
